Furfrou (TCG)

  • Language
  • Watch
  • View source
← #0675: Pangoro
Pokémon
#0677: Espurr →

Furfrou has been featured on 7 different cards since it debuted in the Kalos Starter Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Furfrou cards are normally Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Furfrou

Furfrou
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
